creator: Hitlabs
descriptionHtml:
Pronto is a collaboration platform created for the everyday user. No fancy syntax or confusing hashtags, just seamless communication so everyone can get responses faster and work smarter.


With automatic language translation, group messaging, and file sharing capabilities, Pronto makes having your voice heard, and understood, easier than ever.

PRIVATE & SECURE
*Every message sent in Pronto is private and closed to your organization, enabling you to confidently share important information and files safely.

WORK UNLIMITED
*Enjoy unlimited video streaming and group video conferencing minutes, unlimited video archiving, and unlimited file sharing and storage.

TASK MANAGEMENT
*Create, assign, and track tasks for individuals or teams, complete with due dates, reminders, file attachments, notes, and intelligent notifications.

READ RECEIPTS
*No more wondering or hoping if a member of your team has opened or read an email or text message. Pronto shows you who has seen your messages.

INTELLIGENT NOTIFICATION SETTINGS
*Set notifications preferences at the team level to ensure that you're notified with the most important message come in... or *not* notified of messages that aren't critical to you in your role.
descriptionShort: An app to help teams learn faster, work smarter, and communicate seamlessly.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing Pronto Meetings: Video conferencing rebuilt from the ground up and packed with powerful features, such as:

· Ability to turn off video
· Improved battery life
· Active speaker switching
· Pinning
· Gallery view
· Background audio support
· Mute control for hosts and group owners
· Higher resolution streams
· Much more!

We hope you love it as much as we loved making it for you. Enjoy, and be human!

title: Pronto - Team Communication & Messaging App

creator: Hitlabs
descriptionHtml:
Pronto is a real-time messaging app that empowers you to communicate more effectively and have fun doing it. The beautiful, thoughtful interface is clean and simple, while packed with features like real-time messaging, video chat, task management, announcements, and instant language translation.

PRIVATE & SECURE
*Every message sent in Pronto is private and closed to your organization, enabling you to confidently share important information and files safely. Control your security by customizing organization roles and group permissions.

LIVE MEETINGS
*No messy conferencing links or emails, just simply tap the camera icon in the upper right corner to connect instantly in a live video session with a single colleague or an entire group in a beautiful full-featured live meeting interface optimized for your mobile device.

TASK MANAGEMENT
*Create, assign, and track tasks for individuals or teams, complete with due dates, reminders, file attachments, notes, and intelligent notifications.

ANNOUNCEMENTS
*Send out important one-way announcements to your entire organization or to select groups. Announcements show at the top of everyone’s screens until they are read, so they are impossible to miss.

READ RECEIPTS
*No more wondering or hoping if a member of your team has opened or read an email or text message. Pronto shows you who has seen your messages.

INSTANT TRANSLATION
*Stop copying and pasting text into a translation app. Pronto automatically detects a message’s language and can instantly translate it from over 100 languages. Have a full, real-time text conversation without worrying about the language being spoken on the other side.

REACTIONS and GIFS
*Be human with reactions and a huge library of easy-to-access GIFs.

INTELLIGENT NOTIFICATION SETTINGS
*Set notifications preferences at the team level to ensure that you're notified with the most important message come in... or *not* notified of messages that aren't critical to you in your role.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hate having to sign out to switch between Pronto accounts? No more! Now you can switch between multiple accounts within the app and you'll still receive notifications for all of them.

Other great new features:

- Hide old groups from your list (they'll auto reappear if someone posts)
- Assign your own nicknames to groups and categories
- See which groups you have in common with someone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Exciting new features in this release:

• @Mentions - Get someone's—or everyone's—attention by using the @ symbol to tag them.
• Brand new notification settings - Set defaults for all groups, mentions-only notifications, and more.
• Do Not Disturb - Temporarily disable notifications for your whole account.
• Account badges - See when you have new messages in your other accounts.
• Grouped system notifications - Notifications from the same group are summarized for easier reading.

INTELLIGENT NOTIFICATION SETTINGS
*Set notifications preferences at the team level to ensure that you're notified with the most important message come in... or *not* notified of messages that aren't critical to you in your role.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Exciting new features in this release:

• @Mentions - Get someone's—or everyone's—attention by using the @ symbol to tag them.
• Brand new notification settings - Set defaults for all groups, mentions-only notifications, and more.
• Do Not Disturb - Temporarily disable notifications for your whole account.
• Account badges - See when you have new messages in your other accounts.
• Grouped system notifications - Notifications from the same group are summarized for easier reading.

title: Pronto Team Communication

creator: Hitlabs
descriptionHtml:
Pronto is a real-time messaging app that empowers you to communicate more effectively and have fun doing it. The beautiful, thoughtful interface is clean and simple, while packed with features like real-time messaging, video chat, task management, announcements, and instant language translation.

PRIVATE & SECURE
*Every message sent in Pronto is private and closed to your organization, enabling you to confidently share important information and files safely. Control your security by customizing organization roles and group permissions.

LIVE MEETINGS
*No messy conferencing links or emails, just simply tap the camera icon in the upper right corner to connect instantly in a live video session with a single colleague or an entire group in a beautiful full-featured live meeting interface optimized for your mobile device.

TASK MANAGEMENT
*Create, assign, and track tasks for individuals or teams, complete with due dates, reminders, file attachments, notes, and intelligent notifications.

ANNOUNCEMENTS
*Send out important one-way announcements to your entire organization or to select groups. Announcements show at the top of everyone’s screens until they are read, so they are impossible to miss.

READ RECEIPTS
*No more wondering or hoping if a member of your team has opened or read an email or text message. Pronto shows you who has seen your messages.

INSTANT TRANSLATION
*Stop copying and pasting text into a translation app. Pronto automatically detects a message’s language and can instantly translate it from over 100 languages. Have a full, real-time text conversation without worrying about the language being spoken on the other side.

REACTIONS and GIFS
*Be human with reactions and a huge library of easy-to-access GIFs.

INTELLIGENT NOTIFICATION SETTINGS
*Set notifications preferences at the team level to ensure that you're notified with the most important message come in... or *not* notified of messages that aren't critical to you in your role.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re excited to present Replies in this release. Tap to reply to any message and the original message will be shown along with the reply to provide context when responding to older messages. Replying also starts a Thread which groups replies together. Tap “View Thread” to easily see the entire reply history for a thread.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Search is finally here! Quickly find messages and files across your groups and DMs with our powerful new search feature located next to the settings icon in the sidebar. You'll get fast search with highlighting, sorting, and the ability to jump directly to that message in chat. We've also added a helpful button in the chat screen to jump to the latest message.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Inviting people in Pronto just got a whole lot easier. We now allow users and admins to generate an invite URL. These links can be used to invite existing members of Pronto to new group chats, or they can be used to invite first-time Pronto users to join your community.
- Admins, this one is for you. A fresh and completely self-serve Admin Portal is now availble. This portal includes new features that allow you to monitor, edit, organize, and manage your Pronto account.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Inviting people in Pronto just got a whole lot easier. We now allow users and admins to generate an invite URL. These links can be used to invite existing members of Pronto to new group chats, or they can be used to invite first-time Pronto users to join your community.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Need to fix a typo after sending a message? Now you can edit the text of messages you've already sent! Just press or long-press a message to get the new "Edit" option.

We've also redesigned the context menu that shows up when you press or long-press a message to be more readable.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Announcements features:

- By default, a group owner can now send an announcement to that group
- Read receipts (visible to sender and admins)
- View the target groups/org
- Delete the announcement just for you

New group-level permissions. You can now control at the group level:

- Who can send a message?
- Who can send an announcement?
- Who can assign tasks?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are thrilled to announce a significant enhancement to our group size limits. Super Groups now support group sizes of up to 3,000 members. This upgrade allows you to communicate, collaborate, and coordinate with larger groups more efficiently than ever before. Talk to your Customer Success Manager to learn more.

Introducing Dark Mode
You asked for it, and we listened! Enjoy reduced eye strain and a sleek, stylish look while using our application. Dark Mode is just a tap away in your settings.
